creating some sort of generative system loopable with the turbulence field from Trapcode Form. A few variants were created.

01-09-21
Minting the first of this collection for my friend JeffTezos

08-09-21
theblockdealer2 collected the first totem from JeffTezos, doing so taking ownership of a token that has, on top of the artistic value of the seamlessly looping visuals, these unique totems are bound with the very true essence of long time friendship. 

10-09-21
Minting this 1:1 640x640 | 500 Frames | 0.03 second per frame
This totem will first belong to m0rpius, who's also been a great friend for a long time. I gave me the honor of allowing me to collect his genesis piece. He is a great illustrator, a seamless loop animator and much more, discover for yourself : 

take a look at his creations : https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/m0rpius/creations
